scripts.format: biome format --write ./src tsconfig.json biome.json tailwind.config.ts postcss.config.mjs components.json
scripts.lint: biome lint --write ./src tsconfig.json biome.json tailwind.config.ts postcss.config.mjs components.json
scripts.check: biome ci --formatter-enabled=true --linter-enabled=true --organize-imports-enabled=false ./src tsconfig.json biome.json tailwind.config.ts postcss.config.mjs components.json
